summary: Hong Kong cop and martial artist Fang Sing Leng travels to Sydney to extradite a drug dealer, but when the hood is assassinated on his way to court, everyone suspects Jack Wilton, an untouchable crime lord.
cast: Jimmy Wang Yu|George Lazenby|Hugh Keays-Byrne|Roger Ward|Rosalind Speirs|Grant Page|Rebecca Gilling|Frank Thring|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Deryck Barnes|Bill Hunter|Ian Jamieson|Elaine Wong|John Orcsik|Geoffrey Brown|Kevin Broadribb|Brian Trenchard-Smith|Peter Armstrong|Rangi Nikora|Bob Hicks|Max Aspin|Robert Fay|Ruth Erica|Phillip Avalon|David Bracks|Ming-Wai Chan|Chok-Chow Cheung|Geordie Dryden|Gerry Gauslaa|Ching-Ying Lam|Ke-Ming Lin|Yuen Lin|Andre Morgan|Chin Tang Tang|Wei-Ho Tu|Alan Walker|Chieh-Chiang Wu|Hsi-Chun Yang|Leng-Kuang Yin|Biao Yuen|Corey Yuen
director: Directors: Brian Trenchard-Smith (as Brian Trenchard Smith), Jimmy Wang Yu (as Yu Wang)
